title: ALEA: 3-year-old shot and killed in Greene County
content:
BIRMINGHAM, AL (WBRC) -
A spokesperson with the Alabama Law Enforcement Agency (ALEA) confirms a 3-year-old child was shot and killed Friday in Greene County.
Trooper Reginal King said the child was killed on Baron Road. This is in the Knoxville community near Eutaw.
He said three suspects are in custody at the Greene County Jail.
Check back for updates as this story develops.
